# 3rd Party n98-magerun2 Modules

## Modules Overview

Use these add-on modules to extend n98-magerun2 for specific tasks:

### Account, security, and vulnerability
*   **bitExpert/magerun2-password-normalizer** – Normalizes customer emails and passwords across a Magento 2 install (archived / unmaintained). [GitHub](https://github.com/bitExpert/magerun2-password-normalizer)
*   **GetPageSpeed/n98-magerun2-module-getpagespeed** – Bundle of convenience commands focused on performance and ops. [GitHub](https://github.com/GetPageSpeed/n98-magerun2-module-getpagespeed)
*   **qoliber/magerun** – Theme compilation and performance helpers to speed up development. [GitHub](https://github.com/qoliber/magerun)
*   **hivecommerce/magerun2-list-api-endpoints** – Lists all API endpoints from the CLI to aid discovery. [GitHub](https://github.com/hivecommerce/magerun2-list-api-endpoints/)
*   **Hypernode/hypernode-magerun** – Extra commands tailored for Hypernode-based Magento workflows. [GitHub](https://github.com/Hypernode/hypernode-magerun)
*   **sansecio/magevulndb** – Security-focused commands that surface extensions with known vulnerabilities. [GitHub](https://github.com/sansecio/magevulndb)

### Operations and maintenance
*   **elgentos/magerun2-addons** – Database, reindex, and maintenance helpers for day-to-day operations. [GitHub](https://github.com/elgentos/magerun2-addons)

### Performance review
*   **florinel-chis/n98-magerun2-performance-review** – Automated performance review for Magento 2, Mage-OS, and Adobe Commerce with actionable recommendations. [GitHub](https://github.com/florinel-chis/n98-magerun2-performance-review)
